adv.js: { localStorage.setItem("id_category", params.id); let data_action = await db.m_action.findFirst({ where: { id: Number(params.id_action), }, }); local.action_name = data_action.name; local.identifier = data_action.identifier; local["id_action"] = data_action.id; if (data_action.identifier === "bimbingan-operasi") { let data_category = await db.m_action_category.findFirst({ where: { id: Number(params.id), }, }); local.category_name = data_category.name; let data_presentation = await db.t_logbook.findFirst({ where: user.role === "staff" ? { id_action: Number(params.id_action), id_category: Number(params.id), t_logbook_status: { some: { id_user: Number(user.id), }, }, is_presentation: true, } : { id_action: Number(params.id_action), id_user: Number(user.id), id_category: Number(params.id), is_presentation: true, }, }); if (data_presentation !== null) { local.id_logbook_presentation = data_presentation.id; local.render(); } local.render(); } local.render(); }} > {children}

load.name: load
load.valueBuilt: async i=>{let t={};return(await db.t_logbook.findMany({orderBy:{date:"desc"},where:user.role==="staff"?{id_action:Number(params.id_action),id_category:Number(params.id),t_logbook_status:{some:{id_user:Number(user.id)}},...t}:{id_action:Number(params.id_action),id_user:Number(user.id),id_category:Number(params.id),...t},include:{t_logbook_status:{include:{m_action_role:{select:{identifier:!0}},m_user:{select:{id:!0,display_name:!0}}}},m_action_category:!0,m_hospital:{select:{name:!0}},m_user:{select:{display_name:!0}}}})).map(e=>{let a={peserta:e.m_user.display_name};for(let r of e.t_logbook_status)a[r.m_action_role.identifier]=r.m_user.display_name;let o=e.m_hospital?.name;return{id:e.id,date:moment(e.date).format("DD MMMM YYYY - HH:mm"),status:e.verified?"Verified":"-",title:e.title,operation_code:e.operation_code,...a,hospital:o,location:e.location}})};

adv.js: { if (user.role === "ppds") { navigate( `/ppds/action/${params.id_action}/${ local.id_logbook_presentation !== 0 ? local.id_logbook_presentation : "new" }`, ); } else { navigate( `/staff/action/${params.id_action}/${ local.id_logbook_presentation !== 0 ? local.id_logbook_presentation : "new" }`, ); } }} > {children}
